long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
URL keeper is a productive extension to keep your favorite urls, just a click away from you. User doesn't need to remember or create a separate file for storing the urls. Just tap on the extension and keep your favorite urls either by typing it manually or clicking the TAB SAVE  button to grab your current tab url for you. You can also clear your all urls when you want. 


if there are other features you want to have in this extension. Please feel free to email me at ak.narejo@gmail.com
